bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2010.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2010. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 7 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (2) Economic Assistance Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$59,417,940" and insert "$71,417,940" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 7 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (3) Medical and Adult Services Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$462,115,457" and insert "$516,183,956" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 7 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (4) Children's Services Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$50,406,838" and insert "$51,438,612" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That section 8 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (2) Health Systems Development and Regulation Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$9,857,188" and insert "$13,857,188" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 5. That section 8 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (3) Health and Medical Services Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$7,477,254" and insert "$8,477,254" F.T.E., delete "178.5" and insert "193.5" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 6. That section 10 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (1) General Operations Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$86,543,144" and insert "$86,227,604" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 7. That section 10 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (2) Construction Contracts _ Informational Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$375,797,103" and insert "$387,283,183" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 8. That section 11 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (11) Education Resources Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$5,874,554" and insert "$5,533,335" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$223,392,375" and insert "$223,727,714" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 9. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (3) University of South Dakota Proper Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$308,109" and insert "$189,082" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 10. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (5) South Dakota State University Proper Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$519,048" and insert "$359,215" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 11. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (8) South Dakota School of Mines and Technology Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$419,833" and insert "$371,482" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 12. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (9) Northern State University Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$636,644" and insert "$441,586" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 13. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (10) Black Hills State University Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$83,383" and insert "$20,534" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 14. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (11) Dakota State University Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$153,505" and insert "$79,144" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 15. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (12) South Dakota School for the Deaf Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$679,913" and insert "$650,242" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 16. That section 13 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (13) South Dakota School for the Blind and Visually Impaired Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$217,271" and insert "$211,950" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 17. That section 14 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF MILITARY AND VETERANS' AFFAIRS (2) Army Guard Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$1,097,677" and insert "$1,056,480" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$14,162,774" and insert "$13,929,325" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 18. That section 14 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF MILITARY AND VETERANS' AFFAIRS (3) Air Guard Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$222,875" and insert "$200,028" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,646,937" and insert "$2,578,394" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 19. That section 14 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF MILITARY AND VETERANS' AFFAIRS (5) State Veterans' Home Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$902,598" and insert "$840,557" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$2,612,148" and insert "$2,519,088" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 20. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (1) Administration, Central Office Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$133,544" and insert "$159,397" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$53,936" and insert "$66,866" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$9,910,243" and insert "$10,417,865" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$1,280,000" and insert "$1,533,887" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 21. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (2) Mike Durfee State Prison Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$4,621,333" and insert "$4,121,122" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 22. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (3) State Penitentiary Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$5,073,448" and insert "$4,906,703" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 23. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (4) Women's Prison Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$924,327" and insert "$881,678" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 24. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (6) Community Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$1,325,063" and insert "$1,345,415" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 25. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (7) Parole Services Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$0" and insert "$23,984" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$256,404" and insert "$268,399" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$0" and insert "$2,595" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$0" and insert "$1,298" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 26. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (8) Juvenile Community Corrections Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$12,104,079" and insert "$11,778,939" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$8,734,080" and insert "$9,024,594" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$480,087" and insert "$625,387" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 27. That section 15 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (11) State Treatment and Rehabilitation Academy Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,420,997" and insert "$2,425,642" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 28. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (2) Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$32,249,326" and insert "$30,295,331" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 29. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (3) South Dakota Developmental Center--Redfield Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$7,052,170" and insert "$6,729,560" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$573,795" and insert "$320,672" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$4,745,639" and insert "$4,602,876" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 30. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (4) Alcohol and Drug Abuse Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$8,155,211" and insert "$8,045,933" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 31. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (5) Rehabilitation Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,804,711" and insert "$2,713,709" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 32. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (12) Human Services Center Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$21,320,032" and insert "$21,082,466" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$9,071,724" and insert "$9,042,817" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,156,245" and insert "$2,150,739" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 33. That section 16 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (13) Community Mental Health Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$14,100,350" and insert "$13,753,235" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 34. That chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 35. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund nine million six hundred seventeen thousand one hundred forty-two dollars ($9,617,142), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the tax refund construction liability fund within the Department of Revenue and Regulation. Section 35. That chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 36. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 10-45C-14, the state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund two million thirty-three thousand five hundred eighty-two dollars ($2,033,582), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the tax relief fund created pursuant to § 10-45C-14. Section 36. That chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 37. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund two million thirty-three thousand five hundred eighty-one dollars ($2,033,581), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the state aeronautics fund. Section 37. That chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 38. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund two million twenty thousand twenty-one dollars ($2,020,021), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the budgetary accounting fund. Section 38. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2010 may be carried over to fiscal year 2011. Section 39. This Act is effective June 28, 2010.
